companyAbout: Google is the world's leading provider of business software. But you probably already knew that. With a presence in over 175 countries, we are one of the biggest technology companies on the planet. What you might not know is that we are leading a cloud revolution. We're using emerging technologies like AI, machine learning, and blockchain to solve critical real-world problems. From advancing energy efficiency to reimagining online commerce, the work we do is not only transforming the world of business, it's helping governments, powering nonprofits, and giving billions of people the tools they need to outpace change and make a difference.
jobDescription: We are seeking a talented Software Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing, testing, and maintaining software applications to meet business needs. The ideal candidate should have strong coding skills and a passion for creating effective software solutions.
keyResponsibilities: Design and Development: Architect, develop, and maintain complex software systems from inception to deployment, ensuring high performance and scalability.
Collaboration: Work closely with a small, dynamic team to design and build products that effectively solve real-world problems and provide exceptional user experiences.
Full-Stack Development: Contribute to both frontend and backend development, ensuring seamless integration, functionality, and performance across the entire technology stack.
Problem-Solving: Tackle challenging, unsolved problems in AI development, including data generation, curation, annotation, and the evaluation of complex AI products.
Innovation: Continuously explore and implement new technologies and methodologies to enhance our product offerings and stay ahead in the evolving AI landscape.
requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science required
2+ years’ experience in web and software development
Demonstrated knowledge of web technologies, such as HTML, CSS, and Javascript
Proficiency in JavaScript, React, and Node.js
Experience with RESTful APIs
Good problem-solving skills
Familiarity with version control (Git)

companyAbout: Atlassian is a leading provider of team collaboration and productivity software. Our mission is to unleash the potential in every team. We provide cutting-edge tools to empower developers, project managers, and service teams. With a culture that promotes innovation, we continue to drive the future of work with agile methodologies and scalable software solutions.
jobDescription: Atlassian is seeking a Data Scientist to analyze large datasets and deliver actionable insights. You will be responsible for developing machine learning models, analyzing data trends, and presenting data-driven strategies to optimize our product offerings.
keyResponsibilities: Data Analysis: Work with large datasets to identify trends, anomalies, and opportunities for product improvement.
Machine Learning: Develop and deploy machine learning models to solve complex business problems.
Collaboration: Partner with cross-functional teams including product managers, engineers, and marketers to integrate insights into product development.
Data Visualization: Communicate findings through effective data visualization tools and techniques.
Continuous Improvement: Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, tools, and technologies to ensure our data strategies remain competitive.
requirements: Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Data Science, Computer Science, or related field
3+ years’ experience as a Data Scientist or in a related field
Expertise in Python, R, and SQL
Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau or PowerBI
Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms
Excellent communication and presentation skills

companyAbout: Fractal Analytics is a leading player in the analytics and AI space, delivering high-quality analytics solutions to global clients. We help companies harness the power of AI and data to drive smarter decision-making and achieve sustainable growth. Our work spans across industries, from healthcare to retail, enabling data-driven innovation.
jobDescription: Fractal Analytics is looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining responsive user interfaces using modern web technologies. The ideal candidate should be proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with experience in React or Vue.js.
keyResponsibilities: Frontend Development: Develop and maintain scalable web applications using modern frontend technologies.
User Interface: Ensure optimal user experience through responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.
Collaboration: Work closely with UX/UI designers to translate design specifications into functional interfaces.
Testing: Write unit tests and maintain high code quality using testing frameworks.
Innovation: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and tools in web development to continuously improve our tech stack.
requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field
1-3 years’ experience in frontend development
Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with React or Vue.js
Understanding of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility
Familiarity with testing frameworks (Jest, Mocha)

companyAbout: Zomato is a leading food delivery platform revolutionizing the way people eat. With operations in more than 20 countries, we connect millions of users with their favorite restaurants. Our innovative approach to logistics and customer service ensures that users enjoy a seamless experience, whether they are dining out or ordering food for delivery.
jobDescription: Zomato is seeking an experienced Product Manager to oversee the development and launch of innovative products in the AI and cloud computing space. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure timely delivery of high-quality products that meet customer needs.
keyResponsibilities: Product Development: Lead the development of new products from conception to launch.
Agile Methodology: Implement Agile processes to ensure timely delivery and high-quality outcomes.
Cross-functional Collaboration: Work with engineers, designers, and marketing teams to build and launch innovative products.
Customer Focus: Understand customer needs and translate them into product features that provide real value.
Leadership: Manage the product lifecycle, set clear goals, and inspire teams to deliver exceptional results.
requirements: Proven experience in product management
Ability to work with cross-functional teams
Strong understanding of Agile methodology
Excellent leadership and decision-making skills
Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Computer Science, or a related field

companyAbout: Salesforce is the global leader in Customer Relationship Management (CRM), bringing companies closer to their customers in the digital age. Founded in 1999, Salesforce enables businesses to improve their relationships with their customers and enhance productivity through cutting-edge cloud-based solutions.
jobDescription: We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure and help automate processes. You will be responsible for deploying, managing, and troubleshooting cloud services. The ideal candidate should have experience with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure and be proficient in scripting languages.
keyResponsibilities: Cloud Infrastructure Management: Deploy, monitor, and maintain cloud services to ensure seamless operation.
Automation: Write and maintain scripts to automate infrastructure management and deployments.
Monitoring: Implement monitoring and logging systems to identify and resolve potential issues.
Collaboration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate DevOps processes into the development lifecycle.
Security: Ensure the cloud infrastructure is secure and adheres to best practices for data protection.
requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field
4-6 years’ experience in DevOps or related roles
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Proficiency in scripting languages (Python, Bash, PowerShell)
Strong understanding of CI/CD pipelines
Familiarity with monitoring tools like Nagios or Prometheus

You will be responsible for deploying, managing, and troubleshooting cloud services. The ideal candidate should have experience with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure and be proficient in scripting languages.
keyResponsibilities: Cloud Infrastructure Management: Deploy, monitor, and maintain cloud services to ensure seamless operation.
Automation: Write and maintain scripts to automate infrastructure management and deployments.
Monitoring: Implement monitoring and logging systems to identify and resolve potential issues.
Collaboration: Work closely with software engineers to integrate DevOps processes into the development lifecycle.
Security: Ensure the cloud infrastructure is secure and adheres to best practices for data protection.
requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field
4-6 years’ experience in DevOps or related roles
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Proficiency in scripting languages (Python, Bash, PowerShell)
Strong understanding of CI/CD pipelines
Familiarity with monitoring tools like Nagios or Prometheus
